title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 651.7 - Change of media for existing records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 651.7 - Change of media for existing records

State Regulations

Those records prepared and maintained under previous
regulations in a paper media and whose remaining retention period falls within
the life expectancy range of any of the media detailed in section
651.5, Figure 1 of this Part, may
be converted to that media at the telephone utility's option, provided the
applicable certification processes described in section
651.6
of this Part are observed
and an audit referencing capability maintained. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
651.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
